Description:
We are seeking a Software Developer with more than 2 years of practical experience in C++, Python, and JavaScript. In this role, you will collaborate with fellow Developers and Product Managers throughout the entire software development process. We are looking for a team player with a sharp eye for detail and problem-solving abilities. If you also have expertise in agile methodologies and widely-used programming languages (such as C++/Python and JavaScript), we'd like to connect with you. Your primary objective will be crafting efficient programs and systems that fulfill user requirements.Responsibilities:Collaborate with developers to create algorithms and flowcharts.
Generate clean, efficient code according to specifications.
Integrate software components and third-party applications.
Verify and deploy programs and systems.
Diagnose, debug, and enhance existing software.
Collect and assess user feedback.
Propose and execute enhancements.
Produce technical documentation for reference and reporting.Skills
Skills:
Proven track record with at least 2 years of experience as a Software Developer.
Familiarity with Agile development methodologies.
Experience in software design and development within a test-driven environment.
Proficiency in Object-Oriented programming languages.
Knowledge of coding languages (e.g., C++, Python, JavaScript) and frameworks/systems (e.g., AngularJS, Git).
Experience with databases and Object-Relational Mapping (ORM) frameworks (e.g., hibernate).
Knowledge of image processing and Open CV is a plus, though not mandatory.
Willingness to learn new languages and technologies.
Exceptional communication skills.
Resourcefulness and adeptness at troubleshooting.
Keen attention to detail.
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
